Dura mater or dura, is a thick membrane that is the outermost of the three layers 
of the meninges that surround the brain and spinal cord. It is derived from 
mesoderm. The other two meningeal layers are the arachnoid mater and the pia 
mater. The dura surrounds the brain and the spinal cord and is responsible for .... 
The name dura mater derives from the Latin for tough mother, a loan...
